name: Jolteon

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.

attacks.name: Pin Missile
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

flavorText: It accumulates negative ions from the atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.

strengths: Pin Missile can deal up to 80 damage
Quick Attack works with Double Colorless Energy
Lightning type is effective against Water Pokemon
weaknesses: Fighting weakness is dangerous in Haymaker meta
Pin Missile is coin-flip dependent and unreliable
Average damage output with bad flips
synergies: Double Colorless Energy - powers Quick Attack
Plus Power - boost damage on successful flips
counters: High HP Pokemon - inconsistent damage struggles

competitiveHistory: This is the non-holo rare version of Jolteon, identical to card #4 but without the holographic foil treatment. It was included to make Jolteon more accessible to players. Jolteon was considered the best competitive Eeveelution due to its efficient Pin Missile attack, though it still struggled against the Fighting-heavy Haymaker meta.

rulings.ruling: Pin Missile requires you to flip all 4 coins and count the heads. You cannot choose to flip fewer coins.
If you flip 0 heads on Pin Missile, the attack does 0 damage but is still considered to have been used.
Quick Attack's coin flip determines the damage before applying Weakness and Resistance.
